## Calculus

For each of the following functions $f(x)$, find the derivative $f'(x)$ or $\frac{d}{dx}f(x)$

1. $f(x)=c$
2. $f(x)=x$
3. $f(x)=x^2$
4. $f(x)=x^3$
5. $f(x)=3x^2+2x^{1/3}$
6. $f(x)=(x^3)(2x^4)$
7. $f(x)=\frac{x^2+1}{x^2-1}$
